body_html: Also, is there a way to still call each operation in separate session.run calls, and avoid this problem? My entire model is written in an OOP fashion and so I retrieve the results of different operations through individual session.run calls in different, individual class methods
body_text: Also, is there a way to still call each operation in separate session.run calls, and avoid this problem? My entire model is written in an OOP fashion and so I retrieve the results of different operations through individual session.run calls in different, individual class methods
body: Also, is there a way to still call each operation in separate `session.run` calls, and avoid this problem? My entire model is written in an OOP fashion and so I retrieve the results of different operations through individual `session.run` calls in different, individual class methods
